original_text:
Who has heard such a thing?
    Who has seen such things?
Shall a land be born in one day?
    Shall a nation be brought forth in one moment?
For as soon as Zion was in labor
    she brought forth her children.
korean_text: 이러한 일을 들은 자가 누구이며 이러한 일을 본 자가 누구이냐 나라가 어찌 하루에 생기겠으며 민족이 어찌 한 순간에 태어나겠느냐 그러나 시온은 진통하는 즉시 그 아들을 순산하였도다

sentences.original_text: Who has heard such a thing?
Shall a land be born in one day?
sentences.korean_translation: 한 나라가 하루 만에 태어날 수 있겠는가?

sentences.original_text: Shall a nation be brought forth in one moment?
For as soon as Zion was in labor,
